snippet: A 23-acre compound, anchored by an 18,000-square-foot stone, stucco and shingled house reminiscent of an English manor, is poised to enter the market.
abstract: Real estate offerings in the Hamptons are about to include 23-acre equestrian compound at edge of East Hampton Village, to be listed at $55 million; property is anchored by an 18,000-square-foot house, outbuildings and nine buildable lots.
lead_paragraph: A 23-acre compound, anchored by an 18,000-square-foot stone, stucco and shingled house reminiscent of an English manor, is poised to enter the market.

headline.print_headline: A Place to Ride in Style
headline.main: East Hampton Equestrian Compound for $55 Million
